segments.source_content: # Using multiple sidebars

translations.zh-hant: # 使用多個側邊欄

segments.source_content: You can create a sidebar for each **set of Markdown files** that you want to **group together**.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以為每組想要**歸類在一起**的**Markdown文件**創建一個側邊欄。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The Docusaurus site is a good example of using multiple sidebars:

- [Docs](../../../introduction.mdx)
- [API](../../../cli.mdx)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

Docusaurus 網站是使用多個側邊欄的良好範例：

- [文檔](../../../introduction.mdx)
- [API](../../../cli.mdx)

:::

translations.zh-hant: 考慮以下範例：

segments.source_content: When browsing `doc1` or `doc2`, the `tutorialSidebar` will be displayed; when browsing `doc3` or `doc4`, the `apiSidebar` will be displayed.

translations.zh-hant: 當瀏覽 `doc1` 或 `doc2` 時，會顯示 `tutorialSidebar`；當瀏覽 `doc3` 或 `doc4` 時，則會顯示 `apiSidebar`。

segments.source_content: ## Understanding sidebar association {#sidebar-association}

translations.zh-hant: ## 理解側邊欄關聯 {#sidebar-association}

segments.source_content: Following the example above, if a `commonDoc` is included in both sidebars:

translations.zh-hant: 延續上述範例，如果 `commonDoc` 同時包含在兩個側邊欄中：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ef6eebef

segments.source_content: How does Docusaurus know which sidebar to display when browsing `commonDoc`? Answer: it doesn't, and we don't guarantee which sidebar it will pick.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 如何知道瀏覽 `commonDoc` 時該顯示哪個側邊欄？答案是：它不知道，我們也無法保證它會選擇哪一個。

segments.source_content: When you add doc Y to sidebar X, it creates a two-way binding: sidebar X contains a link to doc Y, and when browsing doc Y, sidebar X will be displayed. But sometimes, we want to break either implicit binding:

translations.zh-hant: 當您將文檔 Y 添加到側邊欄 X 時，會建立雙向綁定：側邊欄 X 包含指向文檔 Y 的連結，且瀏覽文檔 Y 時會顯示側邊欄 X。但有時我們希望打破其中一種隱式綁定：

segments.source_content:
1. _How do I generate a link to doc Y in sidebar X without making sidebar X displayed on Y?_ For example, when I include doc Y in multiple sidebars as in the example above, and I want to explicitly tell Docusaurus to display one sidebar?
2. _How do I make sidebar X displayed when browsing doc Y, but sidebar X shouldn't contain the link to Y?_ For example, when Y is a "doc home page" and the sidebar is purely used for navigation?

translations.zh-hant:
1. _如何在側邊欄 X 中生成指向文檔 Y 的連結，而不讓側邊欄 X 在 Y 上顯示？_ 例如，當我在上述範例中將文檔 Y 包含在多個側邊欄時，如何明確告訴 Docusaurus 顯示某個特定側邊欄？
2. _如何讓瀏覽文檔 Y 時顯示側邊欄 X，但側邊欄 X 不應包含指向 Y 的連結？_ 例如，當 Y 是「文檔首頁」且側邊欄僅用於導航時？

segments.source_content: Front matter option `displayed_sidebar` will forcibly set the sidebar association. For the same example, you can still use doc shorthands without any special configuration:

translations.zh-hant: Front matter 選項 `displayed_sidebar` 會強制設定側邊欄關聯。對於相同範例，您仍可使用文檔簡寫而無需特殊配置：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ac961110

segments.source_content: And then add a front matter:

translations.zh-hant: 然後添加 front matter：

segments.source_content:
```md title="commonDoc.md"
---
displayed_sidebar: apiSidebar
---
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5a41b4fb

segments.source_content: Which explicitly tells Docusaurus to display `apiSidebar` when browsing `commonDoc`. Using the same method, you can make sidebar X which doesn't contain doc Y appear on doc Y:

translations.zh-hant: 這會明確告訴 Docusaurus 在瀏覽 `commonDoc` 時顯示 `apiSidebar`。使用相同方法，您可以讓不包含文檔 Y 的側邊欄 X 出現在文檔 Y 上：

segments.source_content:
```md title="home.md"
---
displayed_sidebar: tutorialSidebar
---
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4fb3ded8

segments.source_content: Even when `tutorialSidebar` doesn't contain a link to `home`, it will still be displayed when viewing `home`.

translations.zh-hant: 即使 `tutorialSidebar` 不包含指向 `home` 的連結，瀏覽 `home` 時仍會顯示該側邊欄。

segments.source_content: If you set `displayed_sidebar: null`, no sidebar will be displayed whatsoever on this page, and subsequently, no pagination either.

translations.zh-hant: 若設定 `displayed_sidebar: null`，該頁面將不會顯示任何側邊欄，後續也不會顯示分頁導航。

segments.source_content: ## Generating pagination {#generating-pagination}

translations.zh-hant: ## 生成分頁導航 {#generating-pagination}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses the sidebar to generate the "next" and "previous" pagination links at the bottom of each doc page. It strictly uses the sidebar that is displayed: if no sidebar is associated, it doesn't generate pagination either. However, the docs linked as "next" and "previous" are not guaranteed to display the same sidebar: they are included in this sidebar, but in their front matter, they may have a different `displayed_sidebar`.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用側邊欄在每個文檔頁面底部生成「下一頁」和「上一頁」分頁連結。它嚴格使用當前顯示的側邊欄：若無關聯側邊欄，則不會生成分頁導航。然而，作為「下一頁」和「上一頁」連結的文檔不保證會顯示相同側邊欄：它們雖包含在此側邊欄中，但其 front matter 可能設定了不同的 `displayed_sidebar`。

segments.source_content: If a sidebar is displayed by setting `displayed_sidebar` front matter, and this sidebar doesn't contain the doc itself, no pagination is displayed.

translations.zh-hant: 若透過設定 front matter `displayed_sidebar` 顯示的側邊欄未包含該文檔本身，則不會顯示分頁導航。

segments.source_content: You can customize pagination with front matter `pagination_next` and `pagination_prev`. Consider this sidebar:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以使用 front matter `pagination_next` 和 `pagination_prev` 自訂分頁導航。考慮以下側邊欄：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_7d898a0e

segments.source_content: The pagination next link on "windows" points to "linux", but that doesn't make sense: you would want readers to proceed to "getting started" after installation. In this case, you can set the pagination manually:

translations.zh-hant: 「windows」頁面的下一頁連結指向「linux」，但這並不合理：您可能希望讀者在安裝後繼續閱讀「getting started」。此時可手動設定分頁：

segments.source_content:
```md title="windows.md"
---
# highlight-next-line
pagination_next: getting-started
---

# Installation on Windows
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1cf51900

segments.source_content: You can also disable displaying a pagination link with `pagination_next: null` or `pagination_prev: null`.

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以透過 `pagination_next: null` 或 `pagination_prev: null` 停用分頁連結的顯示。

segments.source_content: The pagination label by default is the sidebar label. You can use the front matter `pagination_label` to customize how this doc appears in the pagination.

translations.zh-hant: 分頁標籤預設為側邊欄標籤。您可使用 front matter `pagination_label` 自訂該文檔在分頁中的顯示名稱。

segments.source_content: ## The `ref` item {#sidebar-item-ref}

translations.zh-hant: ## `ref` 項目 {#sidebar-item-ref}

segments.source_content: The `ref` type is identical to the [`doc` type](./items.mdx#sidebar-item-doc) in every way, except that it doesn't participate in generating navigation metadata. It only registers itself as a link. When [generating pagination](#generating-pagination) and [displaying sidebar](#sidebar-association), `ref` items are completely ignored.

translations.zh-hant: `ref` 類型與 [`doc` 類型](./items.mdx#sidebar-item-doc)在各方面完全相同，唯一的區別在於它不會參與生成導航元數據。它僅將自身註冊為一個連結。在[生成分頁](#generating-pagination)和[顯示側邊欄](#sidebar-association)時，`ref` 項目會被完全忽略。

segments.source_content: It is particularly useful where you wish to link to the same document from multiple sidebars. The document only belongs to one sidebar (the one where it's registered as `type: 'doc'` or from an autogenerated directory), but its link will appear in all sidebars that it's registered in.

translations.zh-hant: 當您希望從多個側邊欄連結到同一份文件時，此類型特別有用。該文件僅屬於一個側邊欄（即註冊為 `type: 'doc'` 或來自自動生成目錄的側邊欄），但其連結會出現在所有註冊它的側邊欄中。

segments.source_content: Consider this example:

translations.zh-hant: 考慮以下範例：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3917a88d

segments.source_content: You can think of the `ref` type as the equivalent to doing the following:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以將 `ref` 類型視為等效於以下操作：

segments.source_content:
- Setting `displayed_sidebar: tutorialSidebar` for `commonDoc` (`ref` is ignored in sidebar association)
- Setting `pagination_next: doc5` for `doc2` and setting `pagination_prev: doc2` for `doc5` (`ref` is ignored in pagination generation)

translations.zh-hant:
- 為 `commonDoc` 設定 `displayed_sidebar: tutorialSidebar`（`ref` 在側邊欄關聯中被忽略）
- 為 `doc2` 設定 `pagination_next: doc5` 並為 `doc5` 設定 `pagination_prev: doc2`（`ref` 在分頁生成中被忽略）
